title: LR-QAOA
description: The LR-QAOA benchmark schema definition, describing parameters for measuring a successful implementation.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'Linear Ramp QAOA' for this schema.

graph_type.description: Type of the graph, '1D':1D chain graph, 'NL': Native Layout graph, or 'FC': Fully connected graph.

num_qubits.description: Number of qubits in the LR-QAOA circuit(s).

qaoa_layers.description: List of the different layers depth of LR-QAOA.

delta_beta.description: Beta parameters slope in the linear function of LR-QAOA.

delta_gamma.description: Gamma parameters slope in the linear function of LR-QAOA.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) per circuit.

trials.description: Number of circuits to generate and measure for the LR-QAOA test.

num_random_trials.description: Number of circuits to generate and measure for the LR-QAOA test.

confidence_level.description: Confidence level for establishing LR-QAOA success criteria. Must be between 0 and 1.

seed.description: Seed to create the random weights of the weighted maxcut problem. This problem is solve using LR-QAOA
